Are you a fan of French cinema?
Oui, absolutely! I watched "Amélie" for the hundredth time last night.
Oh, I love that movie! The cinematography is so beautiful.
Right? And the soundtrack is divine!
It is! Have you seen "The Intouchables"?
Oui, of course! It made me laugh and cry.  What's your favorite French cheese?
I adore a good Camembert, especially with a baguette and some grapes. What about you?
Oh, me too! Camembert is so creamy and delicious.
